ARABIC: ثُمَّ عَفَوْنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We pardoned you after that so that perhaps you would show thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Even so, We pardoned you that you may be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: yet We pardoned you even after that so that you might become grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Afterwards, We forgave you so that you would perhaps appreciate Our favors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after that We pardoned you so that you may be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then after that We forgave you so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We pardoned you after that so that you might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then We pardoned you after that, that haply you should be thankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then, even after that, We pardoned you in order that ye might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet after that We pardoned you, so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We pardoned you thereafter, that haply ye may return thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We excused you after that so that you might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Even then We did forgive you; there was a chance for you to be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then after that We forgave you so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet after that We pardoned you, so that you might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We pardoned you after that, so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:52] Then We pardoned you, erasing your sins, after that, act of worship, so that you might be thankful, for Our favour upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then, even after that), after you worshipped the calf, (We pardoned you), left you alone and did not exterminate you (in order that ye might give thanks), so that you might give thanks to Us for pardoning you.
